products.name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Crew Tee Undershirts, Moisture Wicking & Tag Free, Also Available in Big & Tall
products.category_path: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > › > Men > › > Clothing > › > Underwear > › > Undershirts > › > Tees

product_details.description: Fruit of the Loom men's crews work great alone or to add an extra layer under a button-down or polo shirt. This shirt eliminates ride-up, it stays neatly tucked so you can go about your busy day with confidence. They are designed to maintain comfort and softness even after many washes. The improved, double-stitched collar stays flat and keeps its shape, providing a consistent look. This Fruit of the Loom t-shirt features a tag free designed to provide all-day comfort. There are soft covered seams on the neck and shoulders for extra comfort. Wear layered or by itself. Available in a variety of sizes, you can choose the ideal one for your body.

products.name: Hanes Mens Undershirt Packs, Stay-Tucked Soft Cotton Undershirts, Best Undershirts for Men, White/Black/Asstd Multipacks
products.description: Size: M | Color: White | Material: Cotton
products.category_path: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > › > Men > › > Clothing > › > Underwear > › > Undershirts

product_details.description: Whether you wear this classic crewneck t-shirt as an undershirt or a tee, you'll appreciate how Hanes® has taken a basic style and made it even better. You'll love the lay-flat crewneck collar, tag-free design, and extra-long length that ensures they stay tucked in. Made with advanced odor protection technology and Cool Comfort® moisture-wicking fabric, you’ll stay cool and feel fresh no matter how long your day is. Stock up on these comfortable men's tees in a convenient 6-pack of assorted colors and start wearing a better-than-basic undershirt.

products.category_path: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > › > Men > › > Clothing > › > Shirts > › > T-Shirts

product_details.description: Tried and true, this men's tall t-shirt showcases the best of Hanes® quality - in an elevated, updated style. Crafted from a tri-blend fabric that includes recycled polyester fibers, this comfortable tee from the Hanes Originals collection is lightweight and very soft. The slim, athletic fit is made for layering, but you won't want to wait for cooler weather to wear this versatile tee.
